# LCX AI — Finance AI by LCX

> LCX AI is an AI-powered financial research platform built by LCX AI Labs. It combines live market data, real-time X and Reddit sentiment, and frontier LLM reasoning into one focused research environment. Use lcx ai for instant, cited answers on markets, assets, sentiment, and earnings — not financial advice.

## Key Information

- [Home](https://www.lcxai.xyz/): Product overview and search demo
- [Features](https://www.lcxai.xyz/feature.html): Search modes, capabilities, Lookout agents, pricing
- [About](https://www.lcxai.xyz/about.html): Mission, team, roadmap, and LCX
- [Documentation](https://www.lcxai.xyz/docs.html): API reference, quick start, guides, FAQ

## What LCX AI Does

- **Financial research**: Ask questions; get AI-synthesized answers from live market data, X, and Reddit
- **Search modes**: Default, /market, /x, /reddit, /deep, /fact, /video
- **Lookout agents**: Recurring research and email digests
- **API**: REST API for query, sentiment, and Lookout endpoints

## What LCX AI Does Not Do

- LCX AI is a research and information tool only. It does not provide financial, investment, or legal advice. All investment decisions are the sole responsibility of the user.

## Contact

- **Product**: Finance AI by LCX (LCX AI)
- **Company**: [LCX — Liberty Crypto Exchange](https://lcx.com) (EU-licensed, Vaduz)
- **Labs**: LCX AI Labs
